remarks.format: ## Remarks 请记住, 对象会在调用之间保存状态。Remember that the object saves state between calls to . 当应用程序使用数据流完成时, 它应将`flush`参数设置为`true` , 以确保刷新状态信息。When the application is done with a stream of data, it should set the `flush` parameter to `true` to make sure that the state information is flushed. 通过此设置, 编码器将忽略数据块末尾的无效字节, 并清除内部缓冲区。With this setting, the encoder ignores invalid bytes at the end of the data block and clears the internal buffer. 逻辑单元中的所有剩余处理的数据 (如代理项对的高代理项) 都根据当前的回退设置进行转换。Any remaining processed data that is part of a logical unit, such as the high surrogate of a surrogate pair, is converted according to the current fallback settings. `Convert`方法旨在在循环中用于对任意数量的输入 (如从文件或流中读取的数据) 进行编码。The `Convert` method is designed to be used in a loop to encode an arbitrary amount of input, such as data read from a file or stream. 它将编码操作的输出存储在固定大小的缓冲区中。It stores the output of the encoding operation in a fixed-size buffer. 如果输出缓冲区不够大, 将会引发异常, 但会尽可能多地填入空间, 并返回读取的字符和写入的字节数。 will throw an exception if the output buffer isn't large enough, but will fill as much space as possible and return the chars read and bytes written. 有关更多注释, 另请参阅主题。Also see the topic for more comments. `completed` Output 参数指示输入缓冲区中的所有数据是否已转换并存储在输出缓冲区中。The `completed` output parameter indicates whether all the data in the input buffer was converted and stored in the output buffer. 如果`charCount`参数指定的字符`false`数不超过`byteCount`参数指定的字节数, 则将此参数设置为。This parameter is set to `false` if the number of characters specified by the `charCount` parameter cannot be converted without exceeding the number of bytes specified by the `byteCount` parameter. 在这种情况下, 应用程序应使用输出缓冲区的内容或提供新的输出缓冲区, 按`chars` `charsUsed` `Convert`参数指定的字符数递增参数, 然后再次调用方法处理剩余输入。In that situation, the application should use the contents of the output buffer or provide a new output buffer, increment the `chars` parameter by the number of characters specified by the `charsUsed` parameter, then call the `Convert` method again to process the remaining input. 即使`completed` 和`charsUsed`参数相等, 也可以将参数设置为`false`。 `charCount`The `completed` parameter can also be set to `false`, even though the `charsUsed` and `charCount`
